text: <!everyone> Here's the application form for interim leadership. If you're interested in leading the team throughout post season and next year, please apply! You can apply to multiple positions if there are multiple that interest you. Make sure you read our constitution and fully understand the responsibilities/commitments that come with each role. Let me know if you have any questions! <https://forms.gle/36bVkmHkLwFy3Fyf8>

elements.text: Here's the application form for interim leadership. If you're interested in leading the team throughout post season and next year, please apply! You can apply to multiple positions if there are multiple that interest you. Make sure you read our constitution and fully understand the responsibilities/commitments that come with each role. Let me know if you have any questions!

attachments.text: This form acts as the first step in electing Hazen Robotics interim leadership for the 2022 postseason. Interim leadership will direct the team throughout postseason recruitment and training and will hold their positions until September of 2022. They will hold all the responsibilities of normal club leadership and will work under the guidance of existing members. By submitting this form, you nominate yourself for your selected position(s), fully understanding the roles and responsibilities that come with them. See the club constitution for details on leadership duties and election procedures. Let us know if you have any more questions about this process or the responsibilities of leadership. Club Constitution - <https://rentonschools-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/kpeck1_rentonschools_us/EVhZD3dGiCZPg4-UIWiOqmYBL2OH1qDjjvObkmNoLzXhwg?e=J5h7Ef>
attachments.title: Interim Leadership Application

text: Also! If you're interested in attending FTC world championships in Houston from April 20th-23rd this year, please reply in a thread under this. It'll be paid by the district aside from food. Need to know ASAP
